description: Retrieves a list of forms for a specified Amplify app and backend environment.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Amplify app.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is a part of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: entities
nested_items.description: The list of forms for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the app associated with the form summary.

nested_items.name: dataSourceType
nested_items.description: The data source type, either an Amplify DataStore model or a custom data type.

nested_items.name: dataTypeName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the data type you are using as the data source for the form.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment that is part of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: formActionType
nested_items.description: The type of operation to perform on the form.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's included if more results are available.
